snippet: For Italians, it comes naturally. But what do they mean when they talk with their hands? Many things. Roll over the images to learn a few classic gestures.
lead_paragraph: For Italians, it comes naturally. But what do they mean when they talk with their hands? Many things. Roll over the images to learn a few classic gestures.
